key_risks: Data privacy and security concerns due to handling sensitive patient data
Economic sensitivity tied to pharmaceutical R&D spending and healthcare industry health
Legal disputes, including the ongoing IQVIA vs. Veeva lawsuit
controversies: 2015 data leak involving a legacy AMS database
Ethical concerns regarding the use of real-world data for commercial purposes
Antitrust counterclaims by Veeva, though dismissed
social_issues: Debates about patient consent and data ownership in the use of real-world data
Commitment to diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI) initiatives
governance_issues: Regulatory compliance risks with GDPR and HIPAA
Potential reputational risks from data breaches or regulatory missteps
